## EXISTING STRUCTURES

No structures have been successfully created or updated based on the provided execution logs.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when reconnecting pipes
- Ensure that the path between the offshore pump, boiler, and steam engine is clear of any obstructions before attempting to reconnect pipes. Verify that there is no placement blockage that could prevent the connection.
- Double-check the alignment and positioning of pipes to ensure they can connect between the intended entities without any gaps or misalignments.
